name: docklock-plus
title: DockLock Plus
description: Control macOS Dock position and automation
author: IGHOR

commands.name: move-dock-left
commands.title: Move Dock Left
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the left side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the left edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-right
commands.title: Move Dock Right
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the right side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the right edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-up
commands.title: Move Dock Up
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the up side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the up edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-down
commands.title: Move Dock Down
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the down side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the down edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: enable-dock-lock
commands.title: Turn on DockLock engine
commands.subtitle: Enable DockLock Plus automation engine
commands.description: Starts the DockLock engine to lock the Dock or enable automation modes

commands.name: disable-dock-lock
commands.title: Turn off DockLock engine
commands.subtitle: Disable DockLock Plus automation engine
commands.description: Stops the DockLock engine and halts all automation

commands.name: enable-dock-follows-mouse
commands.title: Enable Dock Follows Mouse
commands.subtitle: Let the Dock follow your mouse pointer
commands.description: Activates DockLock Plus automation to move the Dock to the screen where your mouse is located

commands.name: disable-dock-follows-mouse
commands.title: Disable Dock Follows Mouse
commands.subtitle: Stop the Dock from following the mouse
commands.description: Disables the DockLock Plus feature that follows the mouse to relocate the Dock

commands.name: move-to-display-by-name
commands.title: Move Dock to Display by Name
commands.subtitle: Move the Dock to a specific display by Name
commands.description: Relocates the Dock to a display using its name

commands.name: enable-dock-lock-on-display
commands.title: Enable Dock Lock on Display
commands.subtitle: Lock the Dock only on a specific display
commands.description: Enables DockLock only for a display by coordinates (x, y)

commands.name: disable-dock-lock-on-display
commands.title: Disable Dock Lock on Display
commands.subtitle: Unlock the Dock for a specific display
commands.description: Disables DockLock only for a display by name or by coordinates (x, y)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
